attributes.action: Resign immediately or call a General Election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like Mr Brown to resign immediately on the grounds that nobody likes him.
He may say that bad Labour results are because of the economy,or the withdrawel of the 10p tax band but it is simply that the British people don't like him.
Nothing personal.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
